name: aem-maven-archetype
description: Generates an AEM Frontend project with Webpack

scripts.dev: webpack -d --env dev --config ./webpack.dev.js && clientlib --verbose && npm run build:lit:development
scripts.build:lit:development: vite build --config vite.config.lit.mts --mode development && npm run build:css:development
scripts.build:lit:production: vite build --config vite.config.lit.mts --mode production && npm run build:css:production
scripts.launch-firefox: node -e "const { exec, writeFileSync, mkdirSync } = require('fs'); const { join } = require('path'); const isMac = process.platform === 'darwin'; const profilePath = isMac ? '/tmp/firefox-proxy-profile' : join(process.env.TEMP, 'firefox-proxy-profile'); mkdirSync(profilePath, { recursive: true }); const prefsPath = join(profilePath, 'prefs.js'); const prefs = 'user_pref(\'network.proxy.type\', 1); user_pref(\'network.proxy.http\', \'localhost\'); user_pref(\'network.proxy.http_port\', 8889); user_pref(\'network.proxy.ssl\', \'localhost\'); user_pref(\'network.proxy.ssl_port\', 8889);'; writeFileSync(prefsPath, prefs); const command = isMac ? 'open -a \'Firefox\' --args --profile ' + profilePath + ' --no-remote --new-window https://uat.dc.tdebusiness.cloud/vn/en/dcp/renewals.html' : 'start firefox --profile ' + profilePath + ' --no-remote --new-window https://uat.dc.tdebusiness.cloud/vn/en/dcp/renewals.html'; exec(command);"
scripts.launch-edge: node -e "const { exec } = require('child_process'); const isMac = process.platform === 'darwin'; const command = isMac ? 'open -a \'Microsoft Edge\' --args --proxy-server=http://localhost:8889,direct:// --user-data-dir=/tmp/edge-proxy-profile --no-first-run --disk-cache-size=0 --new-window --aggressive-cache-discard --disable-notifications --disable-remote-fonts --disable-reading-from-canvas --disable-remote-playback-api --disable-shared-workers --disable-voice-input --enable-aggressive-domstorage-flushing https://uat.dc.tdebusiness.cloud/vn/en/dcp/renewals.html' : 'start msedge --proxy-server=http://localhost:8889 --no-first-run --disk-cache-size=0 --new-window --aggressive-cache-discard --disable-notifications --disable-remote-fonts --disable-reading-from-canvas --disable-remote-playback-api --disable-shared-workers --disable-voice-input --enable-aggressive-domstorage-flushing --disable-cache https://uat.dc.tdebusiness.cloud/vn/en/dcp/renewals.html'; exec(command);"
scripts.launch-chrome: node -e "const { exec } = require('child_process'); const isMac = process.platform === 'darwin'; const command = isMac ? 'open -a \'Google Chrome\' --args --proxy-server=http://localhost:8889 --user-data-dir=/tmp/chrome-proxy-profile --no-first-run --disk-cache-size=0 --new-window --aggressive-cache-discard --disable-notifications --disable-remote-fonts --disable-reading-from-canvas --disable-remote-playback-api --disable-shared-workers --disable-voice-input --enable-aggressive-domstorage-flushing https://uat.dc.tdebusiness.cloud/vn/en/dcp/renewals.html' : 'start chrome --proxy-server=http://localhost:8889 --no-first-run --disk-cache-size=0 --new-window --aggressive-cache-discard --disable-notifications --disable-remote-fonts --disable-reading-from-canvas --disable-remote-playback-api --disable-shared-workers --disable-voice-input --enable-aggressive-domstorage-flushing --disable-cache https://uat.dc.tdebusiness.cloud/vn/en/dcp/renewals.html'; exec(command);"
scripts.proxy: npm run hoxy & npm run launch-edge
scripts.prepare: is-ci || (cd ../../../ && husky install content/techdata/ui.frontend/.husky && git submodule update --init --recursive)
